title: Valentines Duo Day!

embed.description: Hey Summoners, It's nearing one of our favourite times of the year, Valentine's Day! This year our admin team have something special in store for you guys, in the form of a duo signup sheet! Simply put in your details and the matchmakers will get to work, releasing the pairings a few days before Valentines.

body:
Hey Summoners,

It’s nearing one of our favourite times of the year, Valentine’s Day!

This year our admin team have something special in store for you guys, in the form of a duo signup sheet! Simply put in your details and the matchmakers will get to work, releasing the pairings a few days before Valentines.

This year, Valentine’s day doesn’t have to be spent entirely in soloq!

Hoping to see some cute couples on the rift~

{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} {{item:3110}}
